basic.name: Powerslide (Q)
basic.description: Slide to a location dealing 105 damage and Stunning enemies hit for 1.25 seconds.

basic.name: Face Melt (W)
basic.description: Deals 68 damage to nearby enemies, knocking them back. Increase Face Melt size and knockback by 50%

basic.name: Guitar Solo (E)
basic.description: Regenerate 66 Health per second for 4 seconds.

heroic.name: Mosh Pit (R)
heroic.description: After 0.75 seconds, channel to stun nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

heroic.name: Stage Dive (R)
heroic.description: Leap to target location, landing after 2.75 seconds, dealing 330 damage to enemies in the area, and slowing them by 50% for 4 seconds.

trait.name: Rockstar (T)
trait.description: Using a Basic Ability grants 20 Armor for 2 seconds. Heroic Abilities grant 60 Armor.

1.name: Speed Metal
1.description: Using a Basic or Heroic ability also gives nearby allied Heroes 20% Movement Speed for 2.5 seconds.

1.name: Prog Rock
1.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe permanently increases the healing per second of Guitar Solo by 5, to a maximum of 100Reward: After gathering 20 Regeneration Globes, Guitar Solo also heals nearby allied Heroes for 50 Health every second while it is active.

1.name: Block Party
1.description: Using a Basic or Heroic ability also gives nearby allied Heroes a stack of Block, granting 75 Physical Armor against the next Hero Basic Attack for 8 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%. Maximum 2 stacks of Block.

4.name: Crowd Surfer
4.description: Allows Powerslide to travel over walls and terrain. If no enemies are hit, reduce the cooldown by 7 seconds and refund the Mana cost.

4.name: Guitar Hero
4.description: While Guitar Solo is active, E.T.C. {highlight}deals 35% more damage{/highlight} and heals for 60% of his damage dealt with Basic Attacks. Basic Attacks increase the duration of Guitar Solo by 0.5 seconds.

4.name: Slow Tempo
4.description: {highlight}Enemy heroes hit by E.T.C. basic attacks have their damage reduced by 15% for 1.25 seconds and E.T.C. restores 6 mana{/highlight}

7.name: Pinball Wizard
7.description: Face Melt does 300% more damage to enemies recently affected by Powerslide.

7.name: Guitar Smashing
7.description: {highlight}Rockstar empowers E.T.C. next basic attack making it reduces the target armor by 15 for 1.5 seconds.{/highlight}

7.name: Echo Pedal
7.description: Using a Basic or Heroic Ability releases two pulses of 18 damage.  This deals 200% bonus damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters. The first occurs instantly, the second occurs 2 seconds later.

10.name: Mosh Pit
10.description: After 0.75 seconds, channel to stun nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

10.name: Stage Dive
10.description: Leap to target location, landing after 2.75 seconds, dealing 330 damage to enemies in the area, and slowing them by 50% for 4 seconds.

13.name: Mic Check
13.description: Hitting at least 2 targets with Face Melt reduces its cooldown by 6 seconds{highlight} and refunds 55 mana{/highlight}

13.name: Encore
13.description: Face Melt leaves an Amp behind, which will knock enemies away again 2 seconds later.Passive: Each enemy Hero hit by Face Melt or the Amp reduces your Heroic Ability cooldown by 5%.

13.name: Face Smelt
13.description: Face Melt slows enemies by 50% fading over 2 seconds {highlight}and deal 350 extra damage against shields and summons{/highlight}

16.name: Show Stopper
16.description: After using Powerslide, gain 35 Armor for 4 seconds, reducing all damage taken by 35%.

16.name: Mic Drop
16.description: {highlight}Activate to Throw a mic on the target position and after 2 seconds E.T.C. will teleport to that MIC. Can be teleported casting Mosh Pit. Mic Drop teleport timing will be stopped when using Stage Dive{/highlight}

16.name: Pull off
16.description: {highlight}While using PowerSlide you can use Face Melt but it will instead pull enemies towards you.{/highlight}

20.name: Tour Bus
20.description: Channeling Mosh Pit refreshes Powerslide's cooldown, and it can be cast to increase Mosh Pit's duration by 2 seconds.

20.name: Crowd Pleaser
20.description: Stage Dive's impact area is 50% bigger, and its Slow is increased by 30%.

20.name: Death Metal
20.description: {highlight}Upon dying, a ghost uses Mosh Pit at E.T.C's location. Each enemy hero affected by Death Metal decreases E.T.C. respawn time by 2 second each second.{/highlight}

20.name: 201% Volume
20.description: {highlight}Activate to make your next Face Melt knockback enemies 75% farther{/highlight}
